alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 5:24PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN CRAWFORD COUNTY THROUGH 600 PM CDT... At 524 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Rudy, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Van Buren... Cedarville... Alma... Dyer... Rudy... Figure Five... Kibler... Concord... Shibley... Furry... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 5 and 17. Interstate 540 between mile markers 1 and 3. Interstate 49 between mile markers 22 and 27. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
